## Devices with local admin accounts
---
This report lists devices that have local admin accounts.
If some accounts are authorized, they won't be listed.
See below some authorized accounts:
- Administrator account
- Azure AD role: Global administrator
- Azure AD role: Azure AD Joined Device Local Administrator Azure AD

content.query:
LocalAdminReport_CL
| summarize LocalAdminReport_CL = count() by LocalAdminStatus_s

LocalAdminReport_CL
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by ComputerName_s
| where LocalAdminStatus_s == "AdminFound"
| project Computer=ComputerName_s,Model=Model_s,User=UserEmail_s, 
['Local admin found']=LocalAdminCount_d, ['Local admin account(s)']=LocalAdmin_s
content.title: Devices with local admin account(s)
